column5: 2-bedroom 1-bath condo with AMAZING VIEWS of the Comal River! This rental will provide a restful night for up to 6 people and is located along the beautiful Comal River. Each condo is fully furnished & includes linens, cookware, washer, dryer, TV's, DVD players and dishwasher.
column8: Comal River Access and Walking Distance to SCHLITTERBAHN - Inverness 112
